extendedInfo.description: Never forget the airing date of your favorite shows again!This app helps you keep track of the many shows you watch. It comes with a daily updated database of more than 240 TV series and shows (mainly from the UK and the US).Select your favorite shows and add the app widget on your homescreen for an even easier access !Features :- Easy access to the date of the upcoming episode of your favorite shows- Database of 240+ shows- Receive a notification if one of the tracked shows comes back after a break of at least 2 weeks- Sublist of the shows you decided to keep track of- Widget automatically updated twice a day UpComing Features (ONLY on the paid version :https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.degree9.TvCalendar) :- Recommandation system to suggest shows you may like based on the ones you watch- Extensive customization of the homescreen widget (resizeable, scrollable, color, etc..)- (if there is demand for it) national shows (spanish shows, french series, german soap operas etc...)- (if there is demand for it) further localizationPlease feel free to share your ideas and feedbacks ! I will do my best to take them into account.
